item.title: Aggressive Passive Optical Networking
item.description:
Passive Optical Networking (PON) is becoming a budget-friendly way to bring fiber optic connections directly to homes and businesses. This technology is advancing so rapidly that new PON standards are being surpassed almost as quickly as they are established. For instance, Ericsson is currently showcasing 10 Gbps GPON. Will we soon see speeds of 100 Gbps or even terabits per second? While it’s not happening overnight, bandwidth requirements are definitely increasing for both home and business wide area networks (WANs)...
